markdown:
**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 182 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3) **Deities** [Atropos](/Deities.aspx?ID=533), [Charg](/Deities.aspx?ID=594) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Range** 120 feet **Area** 20-foot burst **Saving Throw** Will **Duration** 1 minute --- You examine the time stream in a particular area, then proceed to stick a few metaphorical pins into it, thickening and slowing down the flow of time until it rumbles along like a river of molasses. Any creature that begins its turn in the area must attempt a Will save. **Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Failure** The creature is [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) this turn.
**Critical Failure** The creature is slowed 2 this turn.
name: Stagnate Time

</summary>

summary_markdown: Decelerate time in a nearby area
text: Stagnate Time Two Actions Source Dark Archive pg. 182 Traditions Arcane, Occult Deities Atropos, Charg Cast somatic, verbal Range 120 feet Area 20-foot burst Saving Throw Will Duration 1 minute --- You examine the time stream in a particular area, then proceed to stick a few metaphorical pins into it, thickening and slowing down the flow of time until it rumbles along like a river of molasses. Any creature that begins its turn in the area must attempt a Will save. Success The creature is unaffected. Failure The creature is slowed 1 this turn. Critical Failure The creature is slowed 2 this turn.
